display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=BhSYchXopKsQ7kNvwG0qW3C&_nc_oc=AdmiHcyq4nTBUrF_k9K0oOeQi1GWlcwqQreShdveOPKEpZZwV_tif6gs_KPs9lJj2oo&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s93Fxmi44WDeg_kT0tCyyg&oh=00_AfPjXKqBs3zc9c-yWqcc5WpSjW5u89c4stwsqkjyYnq_Qg&oe=684B845D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=TZqaopFtVacQ7kNvwF-icP4&_nc_oc=AdlFeF6xkDBl6DRsXDBIN2AjIMYxhaXhf7a9Z09gL4dueHvzybVudKJcep8Tg-sXlzY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s93Fxmi44WDeg_kT0tCyyg&oh=00_AfMnqJo0OLrbUaqofJfjvi-FQSZvng-H2nLJhOTrxzwh1A&oe=684B6612)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=SrSLY-pO3SgQ7kNvwF5rjPC&_nc_oc=Adn1Ppt8sF-wU681nmADaJ89YWkxeqZIq67Wl81sKQQ8axreDtpS6Fm-4qdDn7pmSy0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s93Fxmi44WDeg_kT0tCyyg&oh=00_AfOxHYOBvlaJWMPT-Q21VP7HPjue7ecdccRBBIXpPVrRuQ&oe=684B6C23)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=vLDGrCupUTIQ7kNvwG9z7x0&_nc_oc=AdmaISTjEJxffmde6bf79wPk3yoLczI7DngmcJ7gfvpd0cMuLLRQTT0-I0JMOH73oQ4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s93Fxmi44WDeg_kT0tCyyg&oh=00_AfMlO61M1iIfaiMuIbMg4oOlPjyZuC2jrWZakZ6pgXZvPg&oe=684B62AE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=Uukf54F0qk8Q7kNvwEkJQwh&_nc_oc=AdmBDsCgi7ilOgD6t-dORlhldcQK-pyf6WX2T4W1dzze4aC6CFdGm3UDJCHw70JBWIM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=s93Fxmi44WDeg_kT0tCyyg&oh=00_AfPVxT0Ag8qMRiKYdtt7g7IuAq9KgrmTADOExOAcAq5KbQ&oe=684B6A96)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
